fantasy.whistle.registered: Registered to %s, will follow you when used (item must be in your hand)
item.fantasy.diamond_carrot.desc: Can be used to breed rare Unicorns.
item.fantasy.golden_carrot_stew.desc: Can be used to help locate the rare Unicorn, said to make them glow when close by.
item.fantasy.golden_whistle.tagged: %s will obey %s upon use. They will only obey you when this item is in your hand.
item.fantasy.golden_whistle.not_tagged: Not tagged to any mount. Right click the item on a mount to register.
